text:
Drag and drop your music
onto your timeline,

and you'll see it appear
below your images and videos.
You can use in and out points
by pressing I and O on the keyboard

if you want to add a specific
section of the track.
Split the audio clip the same way as video

by moving the position
marker to the point you want

and then pressing command
+ B on your keyboard.
Change the length of the track
by dragging the arrow icons, like this.
To change the volume of the music,

click and drag the horizontal
line on your track up or down.

To gradually fade in
or fade out of a track,
click and drag the two circle icons
on the ends of the music, like this.
